venue.address_1: please contact revchristine@centersoflight.org to get the full address
venue.name: North Cambridge - Close to Alewife

item.description:
Learn and experience the way of the mystic. Mysticism is a personal spiritual path that leads to  unmistakable, real experience of God inside yourself.

Discover our holistic approach of teaching meditation. Meditation is an art that not only is developed during the actual meditation time; but also with every thought, action & desire of our daily life.

Find out how you can experience deep joy, healing, better relationships, and a sense of meaning in your life.

Program begins: February 26

5 Tuesdays, 7:30-9:15pm

Program is free; Donations are welcome

During all these classes, we will talk more in depth about what mysticism is.

We will practice spiritual exercises designed to help you develop skills needed for inner work.

You will receive an  understanding of the cosmos, the Laws and Beings that govern it, and our roles as living, conscious humans in that cosmos.

Class 1: How to use the law of Prayer to co-create what you want.

Class 2: How to access divine intelligence and peace through Meditation

Class 3: How to use the Law of Giving to change how you feel and be an agent of healing

Class 4: What is enlightenment and how can I get there?

Class 5: How to access the wisdom of your soul and your life purpose.
item.name: Experience Meditation and Mysticism
